project_plan.name: Python Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a Python-based quiz game that asks multiple-choice questions and tracks the user's score.

task.name: Define quiz questions and answers in a variable
Implement the user interface for displaying questions and options
Implement score tracking logic to calculate the user's score
Display the final score to the user at the end of the game
Write tests for each of the components (questions, score tracking, final display)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
